snippet.question: Do you think that prisoners should be given the opporotunity to pursue a college education while in prison?

answer.text: Yes, I think that it would be better if prisoners recieved an education while in jail
No, I have some objections to providing lawbreakers with free education from the state

snippet.question: What is your primary reason for supporting the education of inmates?

answer.text: It is better for the prisoners, and gives them a chance at re-entering society
It is the ethical thing to do, and gives prisoners a way to focus their lives
Many prisoners have not had the opporotunity to receive a good education
It will decrease rates of ricidivism, and lower our overall culture of crime

snippet.question: What are your primary objections surrounding the education of inmates?

answer.text: Financially: we shouldn't be paying for something to benefit lawbreakers
Ethically: It isn't right to reward someone for breaking the law
Behaviorally: This lessens the degree to which prison is a punishment
Forcasting: Educating those who harm our society is a bad idea
